name: Music_3886.wav
keywords: ['low quality', 'noisy', 'crackling', 'vinyl', 'dark moody piano melody', 'muffled snare hit', 'flat male vocal snippet', 'dark', 'suspenseful', 'dramatic', 'warm']
caption: The low quality recording features a dark moody piano melody and at the very end of the loop, a short snippet of muffled snare hit and flat male vocals. It sounds very noisy, as there are vinyl cracklings, but also warm, suspenseful, dark and dramatic - almost like a horror movie melody theme.
